idea-plugin.name: Jenkins Control Plugin
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0-SNAPSHOT - Initial version including the following features : - Server configuration, - Jenkins jobs display with autorefreshed job list and view selection, - Job Build runner, - Open Job web page and its last build web page on browser, - Autorefreshed Rss Reader View, - Autorefresh functions can be disabled on the Jenkins Configuration Panel.
TODO List : + Features - Provide a filter on the build status, - Apply the Force Refresh Action on all nodes (root and jobs) - Updating Jenkins plugin configuration updates also the component itself. + Tech : - Better Exception Handling, - Fix weird bug on the build request sent to the Jenkins server, - Fix bug when IDEA tries to connect the remote plugin repository (Settings -> Plugins), it makes Jenkins plugin crash
